alert.note: Alert for Bannock; Bingham; Bonneville; Caribou (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 8:38PM MDT until July 24 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Caribou County in southeastern Idaho... Northeastern Bannock County in southeastern Idaho... Southeastern Bonneville County in southeastern Idaho... Southeastern Bingham County in southeastern Idaho... * Until 930 PM MDT. * At 837 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Goshen to near Chesterfield Reservoir to near Grace, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Soda Springs, Lava Hot Springs, Blackfoot Reservoir, Wayan, Chesterfield Reservoir, Fort Hall Lincoln Creek Lodge, Bone, Henry, Chesterfield, Cutthroat Trout Campground, Trail Creek Campground, Wapello, Mill Canyon Campground, Bancroft, and Grays Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
